snippet.title: How to Achieve SUSTAINABLE Weight Loss 🍊🍭 | Farah Amber Podcast 4
snippet.description:
Thanks for tuning in! This podcast, I invite my friend along who has a specific weight loss goal and I try to guide her through it so that it is realistic, sustainable and an easy approach to help her achieve her fitness goal. We discuss the different aspects to a calorie deficit such as sticking to the diet, making it realistic for you, adapting it into your lifestyle, so that it works in the long run. 
Hope it helps and if any questions spark, please reach out!

Thanks for watching!!

Don't hesitate to leave a like or a comment if you enjoyed this video and remember to subscribe to get updated about my upcoming video's!

Much love,

Farah Amber

(P.S. sorry about the robotic podcast voice - lost my audio and had to use the one from the Zoom recording).

Time stamps:
00:00 - Teaser
00:28 - Introduction
01:38 - Betty's fitness goal
03:07 - Betty's gym schedule
04:03 - Betty's current workout & calorie burn
05:46 - Betty's timeframe
06:27 - Calculating a calorie deficit
08:19 - My Fitness Pal tracking app
11:11 - Tracking progress
12:41 - Eating fulfilling foods
15:37 - Types of cardio for weight loss
17:54 - Walking for weight loss
20:38 - Lean legs approach
22:25 - Final advice to make it a lifestyle
25:31 - My approach
27:02 - Summary & conclusion

Subscribe here: https://www.youtube.com/farahamber?sub_confirmation=1
